scripts.setup: NODE_PATH=. npm rebuild node-sass && npm run sass && npm run createVersionFile && npm run sass-ie8 && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: NODE_PATH=. node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js app/assets/javascripts/cookie.js -o public/javascripts/cookie_bundle.js && NODE_PATH=. node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js app/assets/javascripts/cookie-v1.js -p esmify -o public/javascripts/cookie_bundle_v1.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run sass:watch && NODE_ENV=dev NODE_PATH=. nodemon -e js,json --watch 'app/' --watch 'test/' -x 'node server.js'
scripts.sass: NODE_PATH=. node-sass app/assets/sass/application.scss --output public/stylesheets --quiet --output-style expanded --source-map true --include-path node_modules/govuk_template_jinja/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk_frontend_toolkit/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk-elements-sass/public/sass/
scripts.sass-ie8: NODE_PATH=. node-sass app/assets/sass/application-ie8.scss --output public/stylesheets --quiet --output-style expanded --source-map true --include-path node_modules/govuk_template_jinja/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk_frontend_toolkit/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk-elements-sass/public/sass/
scripts.test:all: NODE_ENV=testing npm run test -- $@ && npm run test:mutation -- $@ && npm run test:component -- $@  && npm run test:smoke -- $@ && npm run test:functional -- $@ && npm run test:a11y -- $@
scripts.test: npm run test:unit -- $@ && npm run test:component -- $@
scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=testing ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true NODE_PATH=. LOG_LEVEL=error nyc mocha test/unit --reporter spec --recursive --timeout 10000
scripts.test:component: NODE_ENV=testing ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true NODE_PATH=. LOG_LEVEL=error mocha test/component --reporter spec --recursive --timeout 10000
scripts.test:a11y: NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true LOG_LEVEL=error ENABLE_TRACKING=false mocha test/accessibility --timeout 30000 --exit
scripts.test:e2e: NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run -c ./test/end-to-end/ --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:codecov-upload: NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. nyc --cache false _mocha './test/**/test*.js' -- -R spec && codecov
scripts.test:mutation: npm run createVersionFile && NODE_ENV=testing ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true NODE_PATH=. stryker run test/mutation/stryker.conf.js
scripts.test-crossbrowser-e2e: NODE_ENV=testing ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true LOG_LEVEL=OFF NODE_PATH=. node_modules/.bin/codeceptjs run-multiple ${BROWSER_GROUP:-'--all'} -c test/end-to-end/saucelabs.conf.js --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:crossbrowser_chrome: NODE_PATH=. ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true codeceptjs run-multiple chrome -c test/end-to-end/saucelabs.conf.js --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:crossbrowser_safari: NODE_PATH=. ALLOW_CONFIG_MUTATIONS=true codeceptjs run-multiple safari -c test/end-to-end/saucelabs.conf.js --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.//: The below scripts are just stubs, don't use them in production
